reward_output:
The user's goal is to send a new SMS message to a specific phone number.
The user opened the Messages app and encountered a prompt to set it as the default SMS app.
The user clicked on the button to set Messages as the default SMS app.
The current screen shows a dialog asking to set Messages as the default SMS app. The "SMS Messenger" is currently selected as the default. The user has not yet clicked "Set as default". Therefore, the user has not yet set Messages as the default SMS app, and has not yet reached the screen where they can compose a new message.

Reason:The user is currently on a screen asking them to set Messages as the default SMS app. They have not yet completed this action, and therefore have not yet reached the screen where they can compose a new SMS message.
